lines.text: I thought you might be a traveling salesman. A lot of them visit farms, you know.
Yeah, I've heard stories about them.
Three bathrooms and I still can't get in.
Ya got to expect that when ya got 15 kids.
Maybe we should have had less kids and more bathrooms.
Are you the Kettle in underwear?
Yeah, but how did you know?

[looks at the low cut dress on the hostess]
That's a pretty dress you've got on... too bad the top wasn't finished in time for the party.
